message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - This paper deals with language identification, which falls under the scope of cs.CL. 
2. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The development of an automatic language identification system involves the use of machine learning algorithms, which is a subfield of AI. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - As mentioned above, the development of the language identification system involves the use of machine learning algorithms, which falls under the scope of cs.LG. 
4. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The study of similarity between the 5 languages at the lexical level involves the use of information retrieval techniques, which falls under the scope of cs.IR. 
5. cs.CY (Computers and Society) - This paper may also fall under the scope of cs.CY as it discusses the development of a system that can aid in the preservation and promotion of these closely related Indian languages.
